instructions: Open the Google Fi website . In the Account tab, under "Your plan," click Manage Plan . Select the phone you want to return and follow the on-screen instructions. You ll see a notification in the Google Fi app or website telling you how many days you have left to return your phone. Contact a Google Fi expert to arrange the return of your phone.
From your phone or tablet, visit the Search settings page. Go to the Handwrite section. To turn Handwrite on, tap Enable . To turn Handwrite off, tap Disable . At the bottom of the page, tap Save .
